name: Basic API Data Fetch
description: Fetch data from an API and save to Google Sheets
prompt: Create a workflow that fetches weather data from OpenWeatherMap API for New York and saves it to a Google Sheet

name: CSV Data Processing
description: Read CSV file, transform data, and send email
prompt: Build a workflow that reads a CSV file with customer data, filters for customers who spent over $100, and sends them a thank you email

name: Slack Notification System
description: Monitor GitHub repo and notify Slack on new issues
prompt: Create a workflow that monitors a GitHub repository for new issues, checks if they have a 'bug' label, and sends a notification to Slack with issue details and assigns it to the on-call engineer
